thread.title: Mohammad Shahzad makes 80 as Afghanistan beat Zimbabwe
thread.title_full: Mohammad Shahzad makes 80 as Afghanistan beat Zimbabwe

title: Mohammad Shahzad makes 80 as Afghanistan beat Zimbabwe
text:
Mohammad Shahzad makes 80 as Afghanistan beat Zimbabwe 22 Oct 2015 16:02:01 
comments 
Mohammad Shahzad made 80 as Afghanistan beat Zimbabwe by three wickets to level their one-day series at 2-2 with one match left to play. 
Set a target of 185 for victory, Zimbabwe made a fine start but once Shahzad had gone they somewhat limped over the line, particularly after the late loss of Asghar Stanikazi for 32. 
Sikandar Raza's 86 was the backbone of Zimbabwe's 184 for eight as Dawlat Zadran took three for 37 for the tourists. 
The series will conclude in Bulawayo on Saturday. Related Sport News
